title: Lebanon: Hackathon Days web conference
body:
We are pleased to announce that ORTEA has been invited to speak at the Hackathon Days, organized as part of the Reestart Project promoted by ICU and ENEA.

The web conference will take place on February 22nd and 23rd 2022 and will focus on innovative solutions on renewable energy technologies, energy efficiency measures and circular economy.

Don't miss Petio Dimitrov's speech at 2.20pm this afternoon, focused on ORTEAâ€™s customized solutions designed and conceived to help Companies improve their power quality and energy efficiency parameters.

[Join Petio at the meeting.](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_MTQzZGEzZmYtNWVlOS00OTc5LWJlNGEtMDdlMzhmNjgwNmQw%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%22f01418a6-08bc-47fd-b440-6cd70183d133%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%22b6b4fe8b-6dcb-4b4f-b1d7-6ad6d90e6831%22%7d)
